member.name: T:ToDoUserControl.ToDoTable
member.summary: UserControl that creates a To Do table capable of adding rows through an included button, as well as changing color and enabling or disabling text

member.name: M:ToDoUserControl.ToDoTable.AddRow(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Method called when plus button is pressed, adds a new row to the TableLayoutPanel and adds a user controls to it dynamically

member.name: M:ToDoUserControl.ToDoTable.evento(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Method called when a checkbox in any row is changed from unchecked to checked or viceversa to change the textbox next to it form enabled to disabled or viceversa

member.name: M:ToDoUserControl.ToDoTable.changeColor(System.String)
member.summary: Method that changes the forecolor of every textbox present on the usercontrol
member.param: Color the text should change into
member.returns: Returns the Color that the TextBoxes are in, for future use

member.name: M:ToDoUserControl.ToDoTable.returnColor
member.summary: Simple method to return the color of the textboxes
member.returns: String that corresponds to the Color of the textboxes
